languages.text: {n}Пышущее жаром и злобой чудовище роет лапой металлический пол и издает приглушенный вой, будто предвкушая будущие сражения и новые жертвы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пышущее жаром и злобой чудовище роет лапой металлический пол и издает приглушенный вой, будто предвкушая будущие сражения и новые жертвы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The abomination, seething with heat and malice, digs at the metal floor with its foot and lets out a stifled howl, as if in anticipation of new massacres and victims to come.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пышущее жаром и злобой чудовище роет лапой металлический пол и издает приглушенный вой, будто предвкушая будущие сражения и новые жертвы.{/n}

{n}The abomination, seething with heat and malice, digs at the metal floor with its foot and lets out a stifled howl, as if in anticipation of new massacres and victims to come.{/n}

languages.text: {n}熱と悪意に満ちた忌まわしき存在は、その足で金属の床を引っ掻き、新たな虐殺と犠牲者の到来を待ち望んでいるかのように抑えられた悲鳴を上げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination, seething with heat and malice, digs at the metal floor with its foot and lets out a stifled howl, as if in anticipation of new massacres and victims to come.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}熱と悪意に満ちた忌まわしき存在は、その足で金属の床を引っ掻き、新たな虐殺と犠牲者の到来を待ち望んでいるかのように抑えられた悲鳴を上げた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'abomination, débordant de malveillance, plante ses pieds brûlants dans le sol métallique. Elle laisse échapper un hurlement étouffé, mais ravi à la perspective des massacres à venir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination, seething with heat and malice, digs at the metal floor with its foot and lets out a stifled howl, as if in anticipation of new massacres and victims to come.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'abomination, débordant de malveillance, plante ses pieds brûlants dans le sol métallique. Elle laisse échapper un hurlement étouffé, mais ravi à la perspective des massacres à venir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只金属怪物用脚刨着金属地板，充斥着热量与恶意，发出了低沉的嚎叫，似乎在期待新的屠杀与新的猎物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination, seething with heat and malice, digs at the metal floor with its foot and lets out a stifled howl, as if in anticipation of new massacres and victims to come.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只金属怪物用脚刨着金属地板，充斥着热量与恶意，发出了低沉的嚎叫，似乎在期待新的屠杀与新的猎物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La abominación, hirviente de calor y maldad, escarba en el suelo metálico con su pie y deja escapar un aullido ahogado, como si anticipase las masacres y víctimas venideras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination, seething with heat and malice, digs at the metal floor with its foot and lets out a stifled howl, as if in anticipation of new massacres and victims to come.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La abominación, hirviente de calor y maldad, escarba en el suelo metálico con su pie y deja escapar un aullido ahogado, como si anticipase las masacres y víctimas venideras.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Abscheulichkeit, die vor Hitze und Bosheit kocht, kratzt mit dem Fuß am metallenen Boden. Sie stößt ein gedämpftes Geheul aus, wie in Erwartung neuer Massaker und neuer Opfer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination, seething with heat and malice, digs at the metal floor with its foot and lets out a stifled howl, as if in anticipation of new massacres and victims to come.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Abscheulichkeit, die vor Hitze und Bosheit kocht, kratzt mit dem Fuß am metallenen Boden. Sie stößt ein gedämpftes Geheul aus, wie in Erwartung neuer Massaker und neuer Opfer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Menfur varlıktan buram buram ısı ve kin yayılıyor, ayakları metal zemine batıyor ve boğuk bir uluma duyuluyor. Bu ses, yeni kurbanlarını ve katliamı dört gözle beklediği izlenimi uyandırıyor.{/n}
